src:
M Taufik Sebut PSI Sempat Setuju Anggaran Formula E di Tingkat Komisi
07 Nov 2019, 23:29 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta Muhammad Taufik heran atas rencana Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) menolak rencana anggaran Formula E di rapat Badan Anggaran (Banggar). M Taufik mengungkit kesepakatan di rapat komisi sebelum naik ke Banggar.
"Ya kan sama juga dia nggak percaya sama orang yang anggotanya dia yang ada di komisi. Bagaimana orangnya dia di komisi?" ucap M Taufik saat dihubungi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Meski sedikit menyesali, Taufik tetap menghargai pilihan dari PSI. PSI punya hak mengajukan penghapusan rencana anggaran.
"Kan di komisi juga kan dia setuju. Saya cek, kawan-kawan (PSI) setuju. Itu hak dia juga di Banggar. Tinggal adu argumentasi," ucap M Taufik.
text:
M Taufik Mentioned PSI Had Agree on a Formula E Budget at the Commission Level
Nov 7 2019, 23:29 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Deputy Chairman of DKI Jakarta DPRD Muhammad Taufik is surprised at the plan of the Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI) to reject the Formula E budget plan at a Budget Agency meeting (Banggar). M Taufik brought up the agreement at the commission meeting before going up to Banggar.
"Well, the same, he doesn't trust the people whose members are on the commission. How is the person on the commission?" said M Taufik when contacted on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Although a little regret, Taufik still appreciates the choice of PSI. PSI has the right to file for the abolition of the budget plan.
"He also agreed with the commission. I checked, my friends (PSI) agreed. That was his right in Banggar. It was just an argument," said M Taufik.
